snippet: Volatility in state budgets is gone, but various factors have caused a drop in tax revenue growth, the National Association of State Budget Officers says.
abstract: Report released by the National Assn of State Budget Officers suggests that the era of chronic budget instability and wholesale service cuts in the wake of the 2008 recession appears to have ended.
lead_paragraph: Volatility in state budgets is gone, but various factors have caused a drop in tax revenue growth, the National Association of State Budget Officers says.
